metadata.name: Shades of Blk - Looking Back
metadata.description: The owner of each NFT will receive the entire discography from our label, Blk Box - that has been released up until now - in WAV format. If someone buys both Marmalade Sky and Looking Back NFTs, they will receive our full discography + 2 unreleased songs that we choose in WAV format. This NFT was created as part of the CryptoBeats exhibit, presented by 0x Society, the first NFT Art Gallery in Canada.
